articles.title: Asia's richest man Mukesh Ambani is set to throw a grand wedding for his son. Here's what to know - The Associated Press
articles.description: In March, Asia’s richest man Mukesh Ambani threw a three-day prenuptial bash for his son that included a 1,200-person guest list, including former world leaders, tech tycoons and Bollywood’s megastars, and a performance by renowned singer Rihanna. It was only…
